<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Download Brand Kit Pdf"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/style-transfer/{thread_id}/pdf"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Download Brand Kit PDF for completed style analysis.

Generates a professional PDF containing:
- Color palette with hex codes
- Photography style rules (lighting, background, composition)
- Do's and Don'ts
- Expert insights with confidence scores
- 8-image shot list with prompts

The analysis must be complete before PDF generation.

Returns:
    PDF file download (application/pdf)
